title: No such interface supported Error !!!1
body:
Hi guy, I really need your help 

I could not install lol to my new computer, there is a message said "no such interface supported" when i try to select the system that I would like to install ?

Please help me, I miss my lovely Teemo T T.

replies.body:
Is this what it says when you try to [download it from the website](https://signup.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload)? Or is this what it says when you try to install it?

What operating system are you trying to install it on?
